1.Question: Which of the following is an advantage of AWS Cloud computing?
Choices: Trade fixed expenses for variable expenses.

2.Question: A company has many different business units all using the same AWS services to manage their different applications.Which AWS service or tool can the company use to receive volume discounts across multiple AWS accounts?

3.Question: A company needs to optimize costs and resource usage through monitoring of operational health for all resources running on AWS.Which AWS service will meet these requirements?

4.Question: A company has a website that delivers static content from an Amazon S3 bucket to users from around the world. Which AWS service will deliver the content with low latency?

5.Question: What AWS service decouples application components so that they can run independently?

6.Question: An organization moves a workload to Amazon EC2 instances on AWS. Cost-effectiveness is the key to running the workload properly in the Cloud.What can the company do to meet this requirement?
Choices: Use multiple AWS accounts and consolidated billing.
Use AWS CloudFormation to deploy the infrastructure.
Use AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS).
Rightsize all the EC2 instances that are used in the deployment

7.Question: Which of the following are advantages of the AWS Cloud? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Trade variable expenses for capital expenses.

8.Question: A company has 50 different business units and requires that each business unit's billing information is viewed separately.What should a cloud practitioner recommend?
Choices: Use separate AWS accounts for each business unit, then filter by unit using the coverage report.
Place each business unit in a different AWS Region, then filter by unit in Cost Explorer.
Tag each business unit's resources, then filter by unit in Cost Explorer.
Use a different VPC for each business unit, then filter by unit using an AWS Cost and Usage Report.

9.Question: You have been running an on-demand Amazon EC2 instance running Linux for 4hrs, 5 minutes and 6 seconds. How much time will you be billed for?

10.Question: AWS Global Infrastructure consists of which of the following components?

11.Question: Which AWS Support plan provides access to architectural and operational reviews, as well as 24/7 access to Cloud Support Engineers through email, online chat, and phone?

12.Question: Which of the below is an example of an architectural benefit of moving to the cloud?

13.Question: How can an organization track resource inventory and configuration history for the purpose of security and regulatory compliance?
Choices: Run a report with AWS Artifact
Configure AWS Config with the resource types

14.Question: Which AWS service or feature can be used to capture information about inbound and outbound IP traffic on network interfaces in a VPC?

15.Question: To gain greater discounts, which services can be reserved? (Select TWO.)

16.Question: A company requires a single service which can manage their backup and restore requirements, their data lakes, and archives all in one place.Which AWS service is suitable for all these use cases?

17.Question: Which IAM entity can be used for assigning permissions to multiple users?

18.Question: Which AWS tools can be used for automation? (Select TWO.)

19.Question: An ecommerce company is using Auto Scaling groups to manage a group of web servers running on Amazon EC2 and are additionally placed behind an Elastic Load balancer.This architecture follows which AWS Well-Architected Framework best practice?

20.Question: A company has a mission critical Linux-based application. The application must run every Monday from 6 AM until 10pm. As the application is critical, it cannot be interrupted.Which Amazon EC2 instance purchasing option meets these requirements MOST cost-effectively?
Choices: On-Demand Capacity Reservation with Savings Plan

21.Question: Which of the following are advantages of the AWS Cloud? (Select TWO.)
Choices: AWS manages all the security within the cloud.
Expenses never change from month to month.
Users can stop spending money on the maintenance of data centers.
Users do not need to deploy applications globally.
Users can stop guessing about resource capacity.

22.Question: Which AWS service provides on-demand downloads of AWS security and compliance reports?

23.Question: Your CTO wants to move to cloud. What cost advantages are there to moving to cloud?
Choices: You don’t need to pay for application licensing
You get free data transfer into and out of the cloud
You provision only what you need and adjust to peak load
You can reduce your marketing costs

24.Question: An IT company has deployed its infrastructure on the AWS cloud. There must be a database that supports reads with a latency of under a millisecond for critical applications.Which AWS service will meet this requirement?

25.Question: Which AWS service can be used to track the activity of users on AWS?

26.Question: Which IAM entity is associated with an access key ID and secret access key?

27.Question: A security operations engineer needs to implement threat detection and monitoring for malicious or unauthorized behavior. Which service should be used?

28.Question: A company plans to connect their on-premises data center to the AWS Cloud and requires consistent bandwidth and performance.Which AWS service should the company choose?

29.Question: Which pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework includes the design principle of defining workloads, applications, and infrastructure as code (IaC)?

30.Question: A company has been using an AWS managed IAM policy for granting permissions to users but needs to add some permissions.How can this be achieved?
Choices: Create a rule in AWS WAF.

31.Question: Which AWS services can be used as infrastructure automation tools? (Select TWO.)

32.Question: How can a company separate costs for storage, Amazon EC2, Amazon S3, and other AWS services by department?
Choices: Create a separate AWS account for each department
Create a separate VPC for each department
Add department-specific tags to each resource

33.Question: Which service can be used to easily create multiple accounts?

34.Question: An architecture's ability to withstand failures with minimal downtime demonstrates which AWS Cloud benefit?

35.Question: Which IAM entity can be used for assigning permissions to AWS services?
Choices: IAM Access Key ID and Secret Access Key

36.Question: After an organization has migrated several servers into AWS, they are unsure as to what they must directly manage themselves.Which cost is the company's direct responsibility?
Choices: Cost of the hardware infrastructure on AWS.
Cost of power for the AWS servers.
Cost of physical security for the AWS data center.

37.Question: A company needs to invoke an AWS Step Functions workflow each time an Amazon EC2 instance state changes.Which AWS service can the company use to meet this requirement?

38.Question: It is important for users to have access to as many resources as they need. Also, the user needs the ability to scale up and down quickly.These capabilities are described by which AWS Cloud benefit?

39.Question: An organization recently migrated to AWS and wants to enable intelligent threat protection and continuous monitoring across all its accounts.Which AWS service should the company use to achieve this goal?

40.Question: How does the AWS global infrastructure offer high availability and fault tolerance to customers?
Choices: The AWS infrastructure consists of isolated AWS Regions with independent Availability Zones that are connected with low-latency networking and redundant power supplies.
AWS allows users to choose AWS Regions and data centers so that users can select the closest data centers in different Regions.

The AWS infrastructure is made up of multiple AWS Regions within various Availability Zones located in areas that have low flood risk and are interconnected with low-latency networks and redundant power supplies.
The AWS infrastructure consists of subnets containing various Availability Zones with multiple data centers located in the same geographic location.

41.Question: What technology enables compute capacity to adjust as loads change?

42.Question: An Amazon EC2 instance running the Amazon Linux 2 AMI is billed in what increment?

43.Question: A manager is planning to migrate applications to the AWS Cloud and needs to obtain AWS compliance reports.How can these reports be generated?
Choices: Create a support ticket with AWS Support.
Download the reports from AWS Artifact.
Download the reports from AWS Secrets Manager.

44.Question: Which Amazon EC2 pricing model is the most cost-effective for an always-up, right-sized database server running a project that will last 1 year?

45.Question: How does Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling help with resiliency?
Choices: By changing instance types to increase capacity
By launching and terminating instances as needed
By automating the failover of applications
By distributing connections to EC2 instances

46.Question: What are the benefits of using Amazon Rekognition with image files?
Choices: Can be used to resize images
Can be used to identify objects in an image
Can be used to transcode audio

47.Question: An organization is considering implementing a new workload in the AWS Cloud. However, the company first wants to forecast costs.Which tool should the company use to estimate the cost of the workload?
Choices: AWS Billing and Cost Management dashboard.

48.Question: What are the benefits of using reserved instances? (Select TWO.)

49.Question: Under the AWS shared responsibility model, which actions are the responsibility of AWS? (Select TWO.)
Choices: Encrypting traffic on the AWS backbone between global and regional AWS facilities.
Scanning AWS service endpoints for vulnerabilities.
Enabling encryption on an Amazon S3 bucket.

50.Question: What is a benefit of moving an on-premises database to Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS)?
Choices: There is no database administration required
There is no need to manage operating systems
You can run any database engine
You can scale vertically without downtime

51.Question: Which service can be used to cost-effectively move exabytes of data into AWS?

52.Question: Which service allows an organization to view operational data from multiple AWS services through a unified user interface and automate operational tasks?

53.Question: How does Amazon CloudFront deliver content to end users with low latency using the AWS global infrastructure?

54.Question: Which AWS service or feature can be used to restrict the individual API actions that users and roles in each member account can access?

55.Question: Which AWS services are associated with Edge Locations? (Select TWO.)

56.Question: What is a specific benefit of an Enterprise Support plan?

57.Question: AWS Direct Connect is used by a company that wants to establish connectivity across multiple AWS Regions using VPCs.Which AWS service or feature should the company use to meet these requirements?

58.Question: Under the AWS shared responsibility model, which of the following is an example of customer responsibility in the AWS Cloud?

59.Question: Are there any AWS services or features that will identify and search for externally shared AWS resources?

60.Question: A company currently uses a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) based application to log in to third-party business applications and would like to have this hosted in AWS using managed services.Which AWS service will meet this requirement?

61.Question: A new web application is being developed by a company. Logging into the application through a social identity provider is a must have requirement for the company.Which AWS service will meet these requirements?

62.Question: How can a user block a suspicious IP address from connecting to an Amazon EC2 instance?
Choices: Block the IP on the inbound rule of a security group and network ACL.
Block the IP on the outbound rule of a security group and network ACL.
Block the IP on the inbound rule of a network ACL.
Block the IP on the outbound rule of a security group.

63.Question: Which AWS service or VPC component allows inbound traffic from the internet to access a VPC?

64.Question: A user needs a quick way to determine if any Amazon EC2 instances have ports that allow unrestricted access.Which AWS service will support this requirement?

65.Question: Which authentication method is used to authenticate programmatic calls to AWS services?
